titles.title: A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the proposed foreign military sale to the Government of Georgia of Javelin Missiles and Javelin Command Launch Units.
A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the proposed foreign military sale to the Government of Georgia of Javelin Missiles and Javelin Command Launch Units.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This joint resolution prohibits the issuance of a letter of offer with respect to the proposed sale of 410 Javelin missiles, 72 Javelin Command Launch Units, and related equipment and support to the government of Georgia.
